## ZipFileTree.ZipFileTreeAccessors class

File tree accessors for ZIP archives.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ZipFileTreeAccessors implements FileTree.IFileTreeAccessors 
```
**Implements:** FileTree.IFileTreeAccessors
